quote: Do you have the resolve to challenge the distortion of the world?
title: Persona 5 Royal

quote: First off, let us celebrate our reunion.
title: Persona 5 Royal

quote: Very well… I have heeded your resolve.
title: Persona 5 Royal

quote: I am thou, thou art I…
title: Persona 5 Royal

quote: Thou who art willing to perform all sacrilegious acts for thine own justice! Call upon my name, and release thy rage!
title: Persona 5 Royal

quote: Show the strength of thy will to ascertain all on thine own though thou be chained to Hell itself!
title: Persona 5 Royal

quote: If you so desire, I shall consider granting you the power to break through this crisis.
title: Persona 5 Royal

quote: Don’t call me a cat! I am Morgana!
title: Persona 5 Royal
